text: allatu oru tankamalikai umakku iruntalanri (um mitu nampikkai kollom) allatu vanattin mitu nir eric cella ventum, (ankiruntu) enkalukkaka nankal patikkak kutiya oru (veta) nulai nir kontu vantu tarum varaiyil, nir (vanattil) eriyataiyum nankal nampa mattom" enru kurukinranar. "En iraivan mikat tuyavan, nan (iraivanutaiya) tutanakiya oru manitane tavira veretuvumaka irukkinrena?" Enru (napiye! Nir patil) kuruviraka
